Ingredients/Creatine Monohydrate

Creatine Monohydrate

Amino AcidsLongevity MixCreatine
Description

A naturally occurring compound that plays a critical role in ATP regeneration, supporting muscle energy metabolism, cognitive function, and cellular energy production. The most researched and proven form of creatine.

Molecular Formula: C4H9N3O2·H2O

Mechanism of Action

Phosphocreatine donates phosphate to ADP to rapidly regenerate ATP, providing immediate energy for high-intensity activities and supporting cognitive ATP demands

Blueprint Dosage

2.5g - 5g daily

Key Benefits
Muscle strengthCognitive functionCellular energy
Research Evidence (12 studies)

Muscle strength

High ImpactHigh Confidence
Creatine supplementation increases phosphocreatine stores in muscle, providing rapid ATP regeneration during high-intensity exercise. Meta-analyses demonstrate significant increases in muscle strength (8-14%) and lean body mass (1-2 kg) when combined with resistance training.
Clinical Dosage: See research sources below
Blueprint Match: ✓ Within range

Research Sources:

PMID: 39614606

Cognitive function

Medium ImpactHigh Confidence
Creatine crosses the blood-brain barrier and supports ATP regeneration in the brain. Studies show improvements in cognitive processing, memory, and executive function, particularly under stress or sleep deprivation. Brain creatine levels increase 5-15% with supplementation.
Clinical Dosage: See research sources below
Blueprint Match: ✓ Within range

Research Sources:

PMID: 39815589

Cellular energy

Low ImpactHigh Confidence
By providing a rapid ATP buffer, creatine supports energy metabolism in tissues with high energy demands. It improves exercise performance in high-intensity activities lasting 0-30 seconds and may support mitochondrial function.
Clinical Dosage: See research sources below
Blueprint Match: ✓ Within range

Research Sources:

PMID: 39574114
Safety Information

Potential Side Effects

  • Mild water retention
  • Stomach upset if not taken with food

Contraindications

  • Kidney disease

Maximum Safe Dosage: 5-10g/day
